moves.1. d4: Hello hiredgun112 fans all over world here is a SURPRISING win for me.He opens with d4
moves.2. c4 Be6: Should have went with Nc6 instead of Be6,well you know what they say about hindsight
moves.3. e3: He now has nice pawn chain and a good grip on the center
moves.4. Nc3: He brings out queenside cowboy Nc3
moves.4... Qd6: I bring out Queen to early,Bf8 trapped and Nf6 would have been better
moves.5. Nf3: He now has both cowboys out
moves.9. Ne5: Now Ne5 has fork on Qd7,Nc6 and f7 which would fork Rd8 and Rh8
moves.10. dxe5 Ne8: This move further binds me up
moves.11. e4 Qc6 12. Na4: Here bringing pressure to my kingside
moves.12... dxe4: Wideopen view of his vunerable lady
i still do not understand en passant
moves.14... Nxf6: i am now ahead in gameknot chess points
moves.15... Nd5: Cowboy runs  i am definately playing reaction chess now
moves.16. Qxe4: Qe4 now threatens Nd5,Be6,but he would sac Queen for Be6
moves.20... Bxd5: i take,he is better protected kingwise
moves.22. b3: not sure why he did that
moves.23. Bf6: another fork by him on Rd8 and Bg7
moves.24... Bh6: i am slowly opening up with what i got left
moves.26. Bxf4: i thought did not look around enough
moves.29. Bf4: this feels like an old western standoff
moves.31... Bh3: At this point white resigns,honestly i believe he had me beat earlier.But this goes to prove never give up there might be an opening,I hope you have enjoyed this annotation please leave postive and negative feedback
